chav1961.purelib.i18n

Class FileSystemLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.i18n.AbstractLocalizer
      • chav1961.purelib.i18n.FileSystemLocalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpiService<Localizer>, Localizer, AutoCloseable

    public class FileSystemLocalizer
extends AbstractLocalizer

    This class is a file-system-based implementation of the Localizer. It can use any available Pure Library file system to keep localization content. This class is an Java SPI service and available thru LocalizerFactory. URI scheme-specific part for it must be well-formed URI with FileSystemInterface.FILESYSTEM_URI_SCHEME

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
    See Also:
    Localizer, chav1961.purelib.fsys, JUnit tests
